answers.answer: If he's diabetic and taking meds for it, that may be the problem. Has he ever talked to his Dr about this? If not, he should. If it's not the diabetes or his meds then his Dr might recommend a Urologist.

The first question is has he ever ejeculated, but the being a diabetic does not help, if he was a 1 then he would be lucky to get an erection, so he must be a 2, is he doing it himself or on drugs they can have some very odd side effects, Tonkat ali is said to incress semen he could try that it may kick him off.Good Luck
He said he used to ejaculate just fine, he's a type 1 diabetic, since he was 9 and gives himself insulin everyday. I'll have to look into that. Thank you :)

question: So my boyfriend has no problem achieving erection, and can perform fine, but doesn't ejaculate ever. He says he feels the sensation of orgasm, and it feels like he is ejaculating, but nothing comes out. What could this be? He's diabetic, could it be the cause of this!? HELP!
title: Ejactulation issues
